timeline.message:
Changes in signature of the function of FastBridgeTransaction

Function named registerBtcTransfer has been renamed by registerFastBridgeBtcTransaction.
Parameter shouldTransferToContract (boolean type) has been replaced by transferToValue (Coin type).
